um.. so you have an applet set to run with gnome panel, but it error at startup and didn't show at all, hence can't right click?
exactly

afaik, the only way to remove it is to use "gconf-editor"  navigate to  apps/panel/applets . click on each and view its bonobo_lid name to determine which applet is the one you want to remove,  then   "rm -r ~/.gconf/apps/panel/applets/<that_applet_id>"
